Ability to adapt to changing designs and requirements Strong team player, thriving in collaborative environments Passionate about Software engineering patterns and delivering highly resilient systems Curious and creative mindset with strong problem-solving abilities Highly driven to make a positive difference and challenge the status quo Proactive, with a positive attitude and a clear sense of initiative Accountable for the overall success of the solution Focus on delivering testable software while adhering to standards and best practices for quality Advocate for technical practices like clean code and pair programming Solid understanding of secure coding practices, with knowledge of mitigating common vulnerabilities Able to multitask and be comfortable in the unknown Additional Information Perks and benefits At SEEK we offer: Support of flexible working, including a mix of office and work from home days depending on your role. Uses the tools and techniques for specific areas of release and deployment activities. Administers the recording of activities, logging of results and documents technical activity undertaken. May carry out early life support activities such as providing support advice to initial users. Assists in the investigation and resolution of issues relating to applications. Assists with specified maintenance procedures. Investigates problems in systems and services. Assists with the implementation of agreed remedies and preventative measures. Uses appropriate methods and tools in the development, maintenance, control and distribution of quality and environmental standards. Makes technical changes to quality and environmental standards according to documented procedures. Distributes new and revised standards.

Company description: Gamuda Land Job description: Job Summary Lead the development of an enterprise-wide data strategy, including implementation of solutions around data warehousing, dashboards and analytics tools. Define the data architecture and analytics initiatives through identifying data types and sources, understanding data and its potential usage and provide the means to support date-drive decisions. Key Responsibilities Lead the development of an enterprise-wide data strategy Create and overseas data warehousing strategies that provide consistent, clean and integrated data. Establish data policies, procedures, structures, roles and responsibilities for data i.e., gathering, storage, retrieval, analysis and reporting. Oversee the structuring of data to facilitate current and future data analysis across the organization and supports the development, purchase, and/or use of data analytics. Establish cross-functional data governance and support adoption and adherence to data quality and process governance in the relevant collaborating functional areas. Identify business and operational data requirements and present ideas on data usage and analysis methodologies to various audiences. Design, create and enable performance management through identification of data source and extraction methods and automate where possible. Support sustainability and integrate solutions that improve efficiency in managing data and analytics. Facilitating and supporting and environment that makes data and information accessible with appreciate channels of access control; acts as an enabler in the use of data to improve performance and enterprise-wide strategy formulation. Conduct extensive analysis, perform gap analysis, support data collection and gather documentation of existing business operations. Support the promotion of enterprise-wide use of data to drive organizational transformation activities. Facilitate member working groups, generating new ideas and testing of new approaches and integrate data and analytics into their business-as-usual and way-of-work. Requirements Degree in Business Analysis, Management, Finance, Engineering or equivalent experience. Minimum 5 years of working experience in an internal consulting, business analyst, experience with Google Cloud Platform & tools and analytics tools (Tableau, PowerBI, QlikView), data warehousing and ETL, project or change management role. 1-2 years at a management consulting firm or in property development/ real estate will be beneficials. At least 3 years experience on Google Cloud Run, CLoud SQL, Cloud Build, Cloud Functions, Artifact Registry, BigQuery, Load Balancer, Cloud Storage, Cloud Composer, Compute Engine, Data Fusion, Kubernetes Engine, Gen AI Search & Conversation At least 3 years experience on MS Power BI, Power BI Data Gateway, Power Automate, Power Apps, Power BI API, Azure Apps Setup

Job Title: T&T Amplify Grad Internship Technology & Transformation - MY
Job Responsibilities: Company description: "Deloitte" is the brand under which tens of thousands of dedicated professionals in independent firms throughout the world collaborate to provide audit & assurance, tax & legal, strategy, risk & transactions, technology & transformation and related services to select clients. These firms are members of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited, a UK private company limited by guarantee ("DTTL"). Each DTTL member firm provides services in particular geographic areas and is subject to the laws and professional regulations of the particular country or countries in which it operates. Job description: Are you ready to Amplify your career? At Deloitte, our purpose is to make an impact that matters for our clients, our people, and the communities we serve. We believe we have a responsibility to be a force for good, and WorldImpact is our portfolio of initiatives focused on making a tangible impact on society's biggest challenges and creating a better future. We strive to advise clients on how to deliver purpose-led growth and embed more equitable, inclusive as well as sustainable business practices. Hence, we seek talented individuals driven to excel and innovate, working together to achieve our shared goals. We are committed to creating positive work experiences that foster a culture of respect and inclusion, where diverse perspectives are celebrated, and everyone is recognised for their contributions. Ready to Amplify your career with us? Join the winning team now! Work you'll do As a Graduate and Industry Intern in our Technology & Transformation team, you will gain hands-on experience in delivering comprehensive solutions to support our clients transformation agenda. This internship offers regional exposure to various facets of consulting, implementation and operations with one of our portfolio offerings below: Cyber: Help clients to rapidly respond to changing markets, new threats and disruptive competition through cyber security assessments, penetration testing, development of cybersecurity frameworks, cloud security, data protection and threat intelligence. Engineering, AI & Data, Operations, Industry & Domain Solutions: Use cloud engineering, data analytics, and AI to modernize systems, implement new technology, and drive innovation and performance. Focus on cost-effective, efficient operations that drive profitable growth by leveraging cutting-edge cognitive and digital solutions to reduce costs, maximize efficiency, transform payments and revenue processes, and adopt emerging business model Enterprise Technology & Performance: Maximise value from digital transformation investments with cutting-edge strategy, design, implementation, and optimization of enterprise systems and software. This involves a holistic approach to performance improvement and digital transformation, enhancing business processes and achieve operational excellence. Customer: Design and implementation of digital marketing strategies based on data-driven, creative, customer-centric approaches that leverage on digital innovation, advertising, human-first vision for creating and retaining engaged customers and powering sustained growth for our clients. Human Capital: Empower organisations through HR transformation solutions, workforce optimizing and future human capital planning, helping them navigate change, and build resilient and future-ready teams, and manage organizational change effectively. Who We're Looking For Available to start in May 2025 Graduates with less than 3 years of working experience who would like to explore a career in advisory and technology consulting services Master's degree or bachelor's degree in computer science, computer engineering, information systems and technology are encouraged to apply Current students who will have graduated or completed an accredited university degree by May 2025 Team player with effective interpersonal and communication skills Exceptional problem-solving ability. Logical reasoning, creative thinking, comfort with numbers, and the ability to untangle complex issues Strong passion for consulting, ability to adapt and cope in a fast pace, challenging work hours and environment Fluent in verbal and written English Got what it takes to Amplify your career, apply now! Due to volume of applications, we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Please note that Deloitte will never reach out to you directly via messaging platforms to offer you employment opportunities or request for money or your personal information. Kindly apply for roles that you are interested in via this official Deloitte website.
